fields.product_title: All-Over Handpainted Madhubani Saree on Desi Tussar Silk - Elephant Motifs
fields.product_description:
Experience the soul of Indian heritage with this handpainted Madhubani saree, crafted on pure Desi Tussar silk in its natural, earthy tone. A perfect blend of rustic elegance and meticulous artistry, this saree is a statement of timeless grace.

The Anchal is a visual masterpiece, painted with the symbolic Tree of Life, surrounded by regal elephant motifs in striking shades of black and red. It’s highlighted with three rich pink panels and fine zari lines, adding texture and a hint of shimmer.

Running across the entire body, the saree features all-over elephant motifs, handpainted with care—each representing strength, wisdom, and tradition. The saree is framed with a bold red border, adorned with floral patterns, giving it a rich, grounded finish.

⸻

Product Highlights:
• Fabric: Authentic Desi Tussar silk with a natural golden-beige tone
• Color Palette: Earthy natural base with red, black, and pink accents
• Anchal: Handpainted with Tree of Life and elephants; accented with zari-lined pink panels
• Body: All-over elephant motifs in traditional Madhubani style
• Border: Bold red border with handpainted floral patterns
• Blouse Piece: Pink 1-metre blouse with Madhubani detailing on sleeves and back
• Care: Dry clean only

⸻

Why You’ll Love It:

This saree is a celebration of symbolism and storytelling—from the sacred Tree of Life to the mighty elephants that carry cultural meaning through generations. The fusion of vibrant color, fine brushwork, and natural silk creates a look that is bold, elegant, and deeply rooted in tradition.

Each piece is one of a kind, hand-painted by skilled artisans who preserve the spirit of Madhubani art through every motif and line.

product_features.disclaimer: The product may feature slight irregularities, which are a natural result of the handcrafted process, adding to its unique charm and authenticity.

fields.shipping_information:
- Ships within 3 business days.
- Ships in our fully recyclable and biodegradable boxes.
fields.care_guide: Regularcare. Use a slightly damp, soft and lint-free cloth for regular dust removal. Always clean in the direction of the grain.

fields.product_title: Dancing Doll on Cotton Silk – Grace in Every Move
fields.product_description:
Celebrate joy, rhythm, and tradition with the “Dancing Doll on Cotton Silk” saree – a hand-painted Madhubani creation that captures the elegance and spirit of classical Indian dance. This beautiful saree brings to life the image of a graceful doll mid-performance, hand-painted with intricate detail and full of expressive charm.

Crafted on a soft, breathable cotton silk base, the saree offers the perfect balance of comfort and sophistication. Adorned with shimmering golden zari borders, it radiates festive warmth and traditional luxury. The pallu features a captivating scene of dancing dolls in vibrant attire, echoing the rhythm of Indian folk and classical dance forms.

Each brushstroke celebrates movement, femininity, and artistic heritage – turning this saree into a wearable piece of performance art.

Key Features:
Fabric: Premium Cotton Silk – light, airy, and elegant
Color: Subtle base with rich multicolor artwork and golden zari highlights (customizable to actual colors)
Artwork: Hand-painted Madhubani depiction of Dancing Dolls in dynamic poses
Blouse: Includes a matching unstitched blouse with complementing design elements
Craftsmanship: 100% hand-painted by skilled Madhubani artists, enhanced with traditional golden zari work

Why You’ll Love It:
The Dancing Doll on Cotton Silk saree is a tribute to rhythm, tradition, and the timeless grace of Indian art forms. Whether worn at cultural events, festive gatherings, or as an artistic statement, it brings movement, color, and celebration to your wardrobe – a perfect harmony of tradition and expression.

product_features.disclaimer: The product may feature slight irregularities, which are a natural result of the handcrafted process, adding to its unique charm and authenticity.

- Ships in our fully recyclable and biodegradable boxes.

fields.product_title: Floral, Hand Embroidered Sujni Saree on Tussar Munga Silk
fields.product_description:
Experience the elegance of traditional craftsmanship with this stunning saree, beautifully adorned with hand-embroidered Sujni and floral patterns. Crafted on luxurious Tussar Munga Silk, this saree blends rich heritage with contemporary charm.

The intricate Sujni embroidery, known for its fine detailing, tells a story of skilled artistry, while the floral motifs bring a touch of nature’s grace to the fabric. The soft, textured feel of Tussar Munga Silk ensures a comfortable drape, making it perfect for any special occasion.

**Comes with a matching blouse piece** for a complete look.

**Perfect For:**
- Weddings & festive celebrations
- Cultural events
- Elegant gifting for loved ones

Add this unique piece to your collection and showcase the timeless beauty of handwork and fine silk, where every stitch reflects a legacy of craftsmanship and elegance.

fields.product_description:
Embrace tradition and craftsmanship with this exquisite hand-painted and hand-embroidered saree on luxurious Murshidabad silk. The saree beautifully captures the essence of Matkor Puja, a celebration of femininity and fertility, intricately depicted through delicate brushstrokes and fine embroidery. Adorning the design are the symbolic peacock and fish motifs, representing beauty, grace, and prosperity.

The natural sheen and softness of Murshidabad silk enhance the intricate artwork, making this saree a perfect blend of cultural heritage and artisanal skill. Whether worn for festive occasions or special events, this saree is a timeless piece that narrates a story of tradition and elegance.
